description:
A coat for the always cold among us. If you have ever left the house wishing you could wear your down quilt everywhere you go, then the Long Long jacket is for you. Keeping you cozy from the top of your head, to the top of your boots, this down jacket wraps you in channels of warm air. Insulated with plush blend of pillowy down and lofty feathers that meet the Responsible Down Standard, this coat is the kind of warmth you can feel good about.

  • Pertex® Quatnum recycled nylon shell has a DWR treatment to shed moisture and a tight weave to retain down
  • Insulated with a blend of 600-fill power white duck down (60%) and feathers (40%) that are sourced under the Responsible Down Standard
  • Indyeva has designed this coat for warmth when it dips to -20°C
  • YKK® 2-way zipper opens from the bottom so you can sit down easily
  • Insulated hood keeps you warm when you forget your toque, or warmer when you have your toque
  • Inside zippered pocket keeps your phone’s battery safe from the cold
  • Zippered handwarmer pockets with fleece lining
  • Snaps at the hem when you need more mobility than warmth
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Indyeva Long Long Jacket - Women's
